mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contact_name AS "contactName", a.contact_mobile AS "contactMobile", a.buyer_id AS "buyerId", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.select: SELECT a.buyer_id as "buyerId", a.contact_name as "name", a.contact_mobile as "tel", 'cantact' AS "relation" FROM t_buyer_contact a WHERE a.buyer_id = #{buyerId}
